---
title: "Invited talks, seminars and workshops"
---

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(gt)
talks <- read_csv("talks.csv")
talks <- talks |>
  mutate(titlelink = glue("[{title}]({link})"))
talks |>
  arrange(desc(date)) |>
  select(date, titlelink, location, details) |>
  gt() |>
    gt::fmt_markdown(columns = titlelink) |>
    cols_label(titlelink = "title") |> 
    gt::cols_width(
      date ~ px(100),
      titlelink ~ px(400),
      location ~ px(250),
      details ~ px(100)) |>
  cols_align("left")
```
